argumentText:
ARGUMENT
u v x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | climadd.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | climadd.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | climadd.4 | |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) |
| 4 |  | climadd.6 | |- ( ph -> H e. X ) |
| 5 |  | climadd.7 | |- ( ph -> G ~~> B ) |
| 6 |  | climadd.8 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | climadd.9 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | climadd.h | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) + ( G ` k ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_climcl | |- ( F ~~> A -> A e. CC ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 11 |  | #P_climcl | |- ( G ~~> B -> B e. CC ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_addcl | |- ( ( u e. CC /\ v e. CC ) -> ( u + v ) e. CC ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( u e. CC /\ v e. CC ) ) -> ( u + v ) e. CC ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> x e. RR+ ) |
| 16 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 17 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 18 |  | #P_addcn2 | |- ( ( x e. RR+ /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> E. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR+ A. u e. CC A. v e. CC ( ( ( abs ` ( u - A ) ) < y /\ ( abs ` ( v - B ) ) < z ) -> ( abs ` ( ( u + v ) - ( A + B ) ) ) < x ) ) |
| 19 | 15, 16, 17, 18 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR+ A. u e. CC A. v e. CC ( ( ( abs ` ( u - A ) ) < y /\ ( abs ` ( v - B ) ) < z ) -> ( abs ` ( ( u + v ) - ( A + B ) ) ) < x ) ) |
| 20 | 1, 2, 10, 12, 14, 3, 5, 4, 19, 6, 7, 8 | #P_climcn2 | |- ( ph -> H ~~> ( A + B ) ) |
